seo.title: Freight FAQs | Orca Intelligence Inc
seo.description: Answers to common questions about Orca's services and solutions.

items.q: Which carriers and modes do you support?
items.a: All major parcel and freight modes (parcel, LTL, TL, ocean, air, rail). Carrier coverage and data connectors are confirmed during onboarding.
Typical clients see first insights in weeks; full rollout depends on carrier/data integrations.
We avoid blanket guarantees; instead, we run an upfront analysis and provide a model of expected recoveries and optimization.

items.q: How are you different from traditional auditors?
items.a: Unified audit + analytics, real‑time dashboards, and a partner model (custom reporting, quarterly reviews, on‑call support).

items.q: How do you work with our finance team?
items.a: We centralize invoices, automate checks, and output clean data for AP and accounting (accruals, GL coding, audit trails).
Flexible commercial models designed to be covered by savings in year one whenever possible.
